short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deagent AI, your gateway to Web3. Primarily supporting Solana, with upcoming support for Ethereum, BNB Chain, Optimism and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deagent AI, your gateway to Web3. Primarily supporting Solana, with upcoming support for Ethereum, BNB Chain, Optimism and more. User only needs to install the extension than could easily access the llm with live web3 data & knowledge
